<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81264</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Democracy and Dictatorship (1)</string>
            <string language="es">Democracia y Dictadura (1)</string>
            <string language="ga">Daonlathas agus Deachtóireacht (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demokratie und Diktatur (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démocratie et dictature (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Democracia e dictatorship (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Democrazia e dictatorship (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημοκρατία και δικτατορία (1)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Definitions for the terms 'democracy' and 'dictatorship' which act as a useful guide to the rise of Dictators in Europe. Includes questions for revision purposes.</string>
            <string language="es">Definiciones para los términos “democracia” y “dictadura” que actuarán como una guía útil para la elevación de los dictadores de Europa. Se incluyen preguntas para utilizarlas como revisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sainmhínithe ar na téarmaí ‘daonlathas’ agus ‘deachtóireacht’ ar féidir a úsáid mar threoir ar teacht chun tosaigh na nDeachtóirí san Eoraip. Áirítear leis ceisteanna i gcomhair dul siar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Definitionen für die Bezeichnungen ' Demokratie 
' und ' Diktatur ', die als eine nützliche Anleitung zum Anstieg der 
Diktatoren in Europa dienen. Schließt Fragen zu den 
Änderungzwecken ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Définitions pour les termes 'démocratie 'et 
'dictature 'qui agissent en tant que guide utile de l'élévation de 
dictateurs en Europe. Inclut des questions pour la révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definições para os termos ' democracia ' e ' 
dictatorship ' que agem como uma guia útil à ascensão dos ditadores
em Europa. Inclui perguntas para finalidades da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Definizioni per i termini 'democrazia 'e 
'dictatorship 'che fungono da guida utile all'aumento dei dictators in
Europa. Include le domande per gli scopi di revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ορισμοί για τους όρους "δημοκρατία" και "δικτατορία" 
που ενεργούν ως χρήσιμος οδηγός στην άνοδο των δικτατόρων στην 
Ευρώπη. Περιλαμβάνει τις ερωτήσεις για λόγους αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
